abstract: Python3-based Jupyter notebook for inspecting the HFR-derived surface current dataset produced by the operational Near Real Time workflow of the European HFR Node.
description: Python3-based Jupyter notebook providing basic routines for inspecting the HFR-derived surface current dataset produced by the operational Near Real Time workflow of the European HFR Node.
